cluster_similarity.title: Clustering Similarity Threshold
cluster_similarity.description: Amino acid similarity used for clustering (ranges from 0.0 to 1.0)

cluster_coverage.title: Clustering Coverage Threshold
cluster_coverage.description: Alignment coverage used for clustering (ranges from 0.0 to 1.0)

min_gene_length.title: Minimum Gene Length
min_gene_length.description: Minimum amino acid length threshold used to filter genes
